rules_text:
When Confine to the Oasis enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Confine to the Oasis leaves the battlefield.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a searching counter on Confine to the Oasis for each of that card’s colors. Then if there are ten or more searching counters on Confine to the Oasis, sacrifice it and you gain 3 life.
